changeSet.author: madina
changeSet.sql: create table card ( card_number varchar(20), password varchar(30) not null, in_hex varchar(20), in_dec varchar(20), actual integer, created_at timestamp without time zone not null default clock_timestamp(), primary key(card_number) )

changeSet.author: madina
changeSet.sql: create table child ( id serial not null, card_number varchar references card(card_number), surname varchar(50) not null, name varchar(50) not null, patronymic varchar(50), gender varchar(6) not null, birth_date date not null, img varchar(30) null, actual integer, primary key(id) )

changeSet.author: madina
changeSet.sql: create table event ( id serial not null, action varchar(3) not null, date timestamp without time zone not null default clock_timestamp(), entrance varchar(20), child serial references child(id), actual integer, primary key(id) )

changeSet.author: madina
changeSet.sql: create table parent ( id serial not null primary key, gender varchar(6) not null, birth_date date, actual integer )

changeSet.author: madina
changeSet.sql: create table parent_phone ( parent integer references parent(id), number varchar(20) not null, type varchar(10) not null, actual integer, primary key(parent, number) )

changeSet.author: madina
changeSet.sql: create table parent_child ( parent integer references parent(id), child integer references child(id), notification integer, actual integer, primary key(parent, child) )

changeSet.author: madina
changeSet.sql: create table device_notification ( registration_id varchar(255) not null, parent serial references person(id), primary key(registration_id) )
